Class DBController

java.lang.Object
logic.DBController
public class DBController extends Object
Controller class that acts as a bridge between the logic layer and the database. It wraps the DBConnector methods and provides higher-level access to database operations.

  • Method Details

    • queryDispositions

      public ResultSet queryDispositions(int mazeId)
      Retrieves all dispositions associated with a specific maze.
      Parameters:
      mazeId - the ID of the maze
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the dispositions

    • loadDispositionMatrix

      public int[][] loadDispositionMatrix(int dispositionId, int width, int height)
      Loads the disposition matrix for a given disposition.
      Parameters:
      dispositionId - the ID of the disposition
      width - the width of the maze
      height - the height of the maze
      Returns:
      a 2D integer array representing the disposition grid

    • insertDispositionMatrix

      public void insertDispositionMatrix(int x, int y, int dispositionId, Integer element)
      Inserts a value into the disposition matrix at a specific coordinate.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate
      y - the y-coordinate
      dispositionId - the ID of the disposition
      element - the element to insert

    • insertDisposition

      public void insertDisposition(Disposition newDisp)
      Inserts a new disposition into the database.
      Parameters:
      newDisp - the disposition object to insert

    • getQuestions

      public List<Question> getQuestions()
      Retrieves all questions from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of Question objects

    • insertGame

      public void insertGame(int userId, int mazeId, int dispositionId, boolean victory, int health, int correctAnswers, int incorrectAnswers, int points, String time)
      Inserts a completed game record into the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      mazeId - the ID of the maze
      dispositionId - the ID of the disposition used
      victory - whether the user won the game
      health - remaining health points
      correctAnswers - number of correct answers
      incorrectAnswers - number of incorrect answers
      points - points earned
      time - the game duration as a string

    • queryAll

      public ResultSet queryAll(String table)
      Queries all rows from a specific table.
      Parameters:
      table - the table name
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing all rows from the table
      Throws:
      Exception - if the query fails

    • insertMaze

      public void insertMaze(Maze maze)
      Inserts a new maze into the database.
      Parameters:
      maze - the Maze object to insert

    • queryUser

      public ResultSet queryUser(String username, String password)
      Queries a user by username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the user record, if found

    • insertUser

      public User insertUser(String newUser, String newPassword)
      Inserts a new user into the database.
      Parameters:
      newUser - the username
      newPassword - the user's password
      Returns:
      the created User object with ID assigned

    • deleteMaze

      public void deleteMaze(int mazeId)
      Deletes a maze by its ID.
      Parameters:
      mazeId - the ID of the maze to delete

    • getTop10

      public ResultSet getTop10(int mazeId, int dispositionId)
      Retrieves the top 10 game results for a specific maze and disposition.
      Parameters:
      mazeId - the ID of the maze
      dispositionId - the ID of the disposition
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the top 10 scores
